entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except minus 20 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16 except minus 20 inland. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 27 February 2023
